item.title: POV
item.description: This time we are going to exploit a new seasonal machine called Pov, this is my first competitive machine and the first one which I have done after failing the OSCP exam, being one of the many I want to do before retaking it. In the end the effort will pay off. ðŸ˜¼

item.title: balsnCTF23
item.description: I have had the pleasure of participating on balsnCTF. This CTF was so funny and I have been able to learn a lot. In this writeup I am gonna write about 0FA and SaaS.
